text:
sayaangku, first of all congratulations on passing another hard challenge 🤍 dan terima kasih banyaaak udah berusaha semaksimal mungkinn 🤍
look, when i tell you that im so proud of you, it’s real sayaang 🥺 im a proud gf, ngeliat dari foto2 yang kamu kirimin, gilaa rasanya seneeeng bgt punya pacar sekeren dan sepinter ini. lagi lagi kamu kasi aku alesan untuk bangga jadi cewenya kamuu, thank you sayang 🤍
aku ngertii kalo kamu ngerasa overwhelmed sama semua yang kamu dapetin hari ini, mulai dari revisiannya, ekspektasi orang sama kamu, aku tau kamu ngerasa ini berat sekali😣 masi lama juga kaaan prosesnya sampe desember.. its okay if you have a bad mood today, tapi kamu harus ingeeeet, lewatin hari ini aja kamu bisa, kamu pasti bisa lewatin hari hari lainnya ‼️ 😾 aku gamau ngebebanin kamu dengan kasi saran ini itu, i just want you to get a really good rest todaay 🥺 but if you need my advice, i’ll try my best, i promise.
trans:
my babyy, first of all congratulations on passing another hard challenge 🤍 and thank you sooo much for trying your bestt 🤍
look, when i tell you that i'm so proud of you, it’s real baabe 🥺 i'm a proud gf, looking at the photos you sent, it's crazyy, i'm sooo happy to have a boyfriend as cool and smart as you. you've once again given me another reason to be proud of being your girlfriend, thank you baby 🤍
i know you're overwhelmed with everything you experienced today, from the revision notes, people's expectations on you, i know it's a lot for you😣 and it's still a looong way to go until december.. its okay if you have a bad mood today, but you have to remembeeer, you made it through today, you can totally handle the days ahead ‼️ 😾 i don't want to burden you with a bunch of advice, i just want you to get a really good rest todaay 🥺 but if you need my advice, i’ll try my best, i promise.
